title: JavaScript: From Browser Scripting to Full-Stack Power
content: Created in just 10 days by Brendan Eich at Netscape in 1995, JavaScript was originally meant to make websites more interactive. While it started as a browser-based language, JavaScript evolved into a full-stack powerhouse with the introduction of Node.js in 2009. Today, it powers nearly every website you visit, thanks to popular frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js. Its versatility and ubiquity make JavaScript the king of web development.
